code: import React,{memo}from"react";import ActivityIndicator from"react-native-web/dist/exports/ActivityIndicator";import firebase from"firebase/app";import"firebase/auth";import Background from"../components/Background";import{theme}from"../core/theme";import{FIREBASE_CONFIG}from"../core/config";firebase.initializeApp(FIREBASE_CONFIG);var AuthLoadingScreen=function AuthLoadingScreen(_ref){var navigation=_ref.navigation;firebase.auth().onAuthStateChanged(function(user){if(user){navigation.navigate("Dashboard");}else{navigation.navigate("HomeScreen");}});return React.createElement(Background,null,React.createElement(ActivityIndicator,{size:"large",color:theme.colors.primary}));};export default memo(AuthLoadingScreen);
